hackathon-description-text: BlairHacks is a hackathon at Montgomery Blair High School that brings together students from across the county to celebrate building awesome technology. To kick off our existence we have partnered with Major League Hacking and their 12 hour Local Hack Day program.
hackathon-eligibility: Any MCPS High School student is elligible

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Memes in Digital Culture (The MIT Press Essential Knowledge series), Doge Plush, here come dat boi (yo whadup) Lapel Pin, Deal With It Glasses

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=51 University Blvd E, Silver Spring, MD 20901, USA
hackathon-location-address: 51 University Blvd E, Silver Spring, MD 20901, USA
